title: RedMagic 7 Review: The ultimate smartphone hardware, with one major compromise
content:
Generally speaking, even the flagship smartphone market is filled with compromises. If you want to pick up one of the best smartphones in the business, typically you’re going to end up foregoingÂ something that another user may have felt was a dealbreaker. For some people, it’s the lack of a headphone jack, for some gamers, it’s

The post RedMagic 7 Review: The ultimate smartphone hardware, with one major compromise appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The RedMagic 7 is a gaming phone with the latest and greatest Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset, but how does it fare as a smartphone?
